description: &&7[Show Me Your Skin]&&r Press &&7[&&r&&6O&&r&&7]&&r to change the visibility of your armor vs. your skin. You can also change the visibility of your equipment like shields and Elytra.

&&7[Weapon Master]&&r Any weapons or tools in your hotbar will appear visually on your back/hips so others can see your sick gear! This might look a little weird if you're wearing a backpack, so you can press &&7[&&r&&6ALT+O&&r&&7]&&r to adjust their positioning, size, toggle hotbar slots on and off, and more.
&&7[Trinkets]&&r Should you happen to find a rare Trinket, you can right-click it once it's equipped to toggle its visibility!
&&7[Drogstyle/StyledNicknames]&&r In Multiplayer, type &&6/nick&&r to set your name, and &&6/colour&&r and &&6/bio&&r to style it.
